title: Percent-encoding
summary: Percent-encoding is a mechanism to encode 8-bit characters that have specific meaning in the context of URLs. It is sometimes called URL encoding. The encoding consists of substitution: A '%' followed by the hexadecimal representation of the ASCII value of the replace character.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
